name: Prodpoint
description: We're a 3D printing startup aimed at production - currently 30 printers and growing. We aim to become Europe's main hub for printing affordable parts.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Felix Fried
team.bioHtml: Founder of Prodpoint, a 3d printing startup aimed at production.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Felix Fried
team.bioHtml: Founder of Prodpoint, a 3d printing startup aimed at production.

jobs.title: Sales Engineer (3D Printing - Maker movement)
jobs.description: You'll be in charge of growing sales as part of UK's leading 3D print farm.
jobs.descriptionHtml: You'll be in charge of growing sales as part of UK's leading 3D print farm.

jobs.title: 3D Printing Engineer (Co-founder)
jobs.description:
Prodpoint is a 3d printing start-up aimed at production – currently 28 printers – for low volume manufacturing (up to 10,000 parts).

Summary
Prodpoint is looking for a 3D print technician to run maintenance and repairs on the machines, launch print jobs for our clients, design in-house samples, and to bring some innovative ideas to the table.  

Required skills:
•	Good CAD design, preferably some experience with Fusion 360.
•	Experience with slicing g-code files.
•	Good writing skills.
•	Experience with FDM 3D printing.

Bonus skills
•	Python Programming
•	Electronics design

Salary: Mostly equity, small salary to cover your costs might be available.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Prodpoint is a 3d printing start-up aimed at production – currently 28 printers – for low volume manufacturing (up to 10,000 parts).

Summary
Prodpoint is looking for a 3D print technician to run maintenance and repairs on the machines, launch print jobs for our clients, design in-house samples, and to bring some innovative ideas to the table.

Required skills:
• Good CAD design, preferably some experience with Fusion 360.
• Experience with slicing g-code files.
• Good writing skills.
• Experience with FDM 3D printing.

Bonus skills

Salary: Mostly equity, small salary to cover your costs might be available.

jobs.title: Business Development (Maker movement - co-founder)
jobs.description:
Connect with potential clients. Establish new opportunities for growth. Keep track of and optimise marketing activities.

Must have previous experience in a similar role with proof of success.
